messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: UL NPR - program about homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Listen to it on the internet! ... From: David Albert [mailto:shantinik@earthlink.net] Sent: Friday, June 16, 2000 9:26 PM To: unschooling-list@ctel.net
messages.messageBody:
Listen to it on the internet!

-----Original Message-----
From: David Albert [mailto:shantinik@...]
Sent: Friday, June 16, 2000 9:26 PM
To: unschooling-list@...
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: UL NPR - program about homeschooling


I was interviewed earlier in the week on Glenn Busby's "The Best of Our
Knowledge", which goes out to 120 NPR stations. Should air this weekend.
But
none of the stations in my area airs it.

So if you hear it, let me know how it turned out.

Thanks!

david


--
"And the Skylark Sings with Me" is to homeschooling what Tom Paine's "Common
Sense" was to the American Revolution."--Greg Bates, Common Courage Press.
To
read a sample chapter or the foreword, and to get information about ordering
a
signed copy, visit www.skylarksings.com or send an e-mail to
shantinik@...

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: UL NPR - program about homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: David, When I was on Glenn Busby s show he automatically sent me a copy of the program after it aired...couldn t hurt to ask. Best, Linda
messages.messageBody:
David,

When I was on Glenn Busby's show he automatically sent me a copy of the program
after it aired...couldn't hurt to ask.

Best,
Linda

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: UL NPR - program about homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: David, Some newer computers come with radios on them. Or you can download it onto your computer from the net.  Im in Portugal and I can hear radio stations
messages.messageBody:
David,

Some newer computers come with radios on them. Or you can download it onto
your computer from the net. Im in Portugal and I can hear radio stations
from all over the world through my internet. I see all kinds of NPR
stations on my station guide. Look on the web and you might be able to
listen to it yourself =) Hope you can!

Holly

over the internet.

messages.messageBody:
I was interviewed earlier in the week on Glenn Busby's "The Best of Our
Knowledge", which goes out to 120 NPR stations. Should air this weekend. But
none of the stations in my area airs it.

So if you hear it, let me know how it turned out.

Thanks!

david


--
"And the Skylark Sings with Me" is to homeschooling what Tom Paine's "Common
Sense" was to the American Revolution."--Greg Bates, Common Courage Press. To
read a sample chapter or the foreword, and to get information about ordering a
signed copy, visit www.skylarksings.com or send an e-mail to
